name: Wizard Roguelike
description:
A 3rd person action shooter roguelike wizard game. In active development.

We first started development after participating in the 2021 GGJ, where we made a small action shooter game called Isle be Lost.

This game is our passion project, that we are developing in our spare time. Feel free to contribute to the creative process with feedback and suggestions! We will be releasing incremental playable version of our game for everyone to play.
Enjoy!

Community Discord - https://discord.gg/CvpQ2A7geF

Youtube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/c/BimzyDev
